long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Old Sweepy adds utilities to various Minesweeper websites that allow you to analyze and solve boards.

Websites Supported:
  - minesweeperonline.com
  - minesweeper.online
  - cardgames.io/minesweeper
  - minesweeper.one

Features:
  - The "Step" button makes moves given the current board.
  - The "Solve" button repeatedly takes steps at the specified interval.
  - The "Guess?" checkbox determines whether the solver should guess when there are no guaranteed safe moves.
  - The "Show Probabilities" checkbox displays the percent likelihood that each square is a mine.
  - The "Do I have to guess?" button tells you if your next move has to be a guess.
  - The "How hard is this?" button tells you how complex the logic of the board is.

Note:
  - On minesweeperonline.com, using the solver can result in an IP ban from the leaderboards. The user can choose to disable cheats.
  - On minesweeper.online, using the solver can result in an IP ban from the entire website. Cheats are automatically disabled. 
  - Disabling cheats will only allow Old Sweepy to display mine probabilities after losing.

See the GitHub for more information.
